message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you is $8,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $9,500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to consider it, but I think the product is worth more than $9,500 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11,000. I think this is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $10,500 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,500. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $11,500. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is $15,000.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $11,000 for the product.
I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11,000, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell it to you for $11,750. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is $15,000.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $11,500 for the product.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11,500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and sell it to you for $12,000. This is my final offer.
Considering our previous discussions, I believe we've reached a reasonable compromise. I would like to finalize the purchase of the product for $11,500.
